title: What is Semrush PPC Advertising Toolkit?
content:
Advertising

The Semrush Advertising Toolkit is your one-stop shop for planning a Google Ads campaign. Here you can access all of the tools that are going to benefit you while you set up and run your advertising campaigns. You’ll find ways to research your niche, study your competitors’ past campaigns, and set up your own advertising strategy with keyword lists and ads.

The tools in this kit cover the following processes:

Market Analysis
Keyword Research
Ad Tracking
Ad Management

Paid Advertising can be one of the most beneficial aspects of your company's digital marketing. Being able to target the keywords that are going to bring you the highest ROI can make all the difference when it comes to competing in your field.

Market Analysis
Keyword Research
Ad Tracking
Ad Management

Once you know the basics of our Advertising toolkit, you can dive in deeper with our user manuals and how-to articles found in the links below.
